aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the set of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the set of tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the set of tag keys in the request

rds:BackupTarget.description: Filters access by the type of backup target. One of: REGION, OUTPOSTS

rds:DatabaseClass.description: Filters access by the type of DB instance class

rds:DatabaseEngine.description: Filters access by the database engine. For possible values refer to the engine parameter in CreateDBInstance API

rds:DatabaseName.description: Filters access by the user-defined name of the database on the DB instance

rds:EndpointType.description: Filters access by the type of the endpoint. One of: READER, WRITER, CUSTOM

rds:MultiAz.description: Filters access by the value that specifies whether the DB instance runs in multiple Availability Zones. To indicate that the DB instance is using Multi-AZ, specify true

rds:Piops.description: Filters access by the value that contains the number of Provisioned IOPS (PIOPS) that the instance supports. To indicate a DB instance that does not have PIOPS enabled, specify 0

rds:StorageEncrypted.description: Filters access by the value that specifies whether the DB instance storage should be encrypted. To enforce storage encryption, specify true

rds:StorageSize.description: Filters access by the storage volume size (in GB)

rds:Vpc.description: Filters access by the value that specifies whether the DB instance runs in an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC). To indicate that the DB instance runs in an Amazon VPC, specify true

rds:clusterPgTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB cluster parameter group

rds:clusterSnapshotTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB cluster snapshot

rds:clusterTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB cluster

rds:dbTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB instance

rds:esTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to an event subscription

rds:ogTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB option group

rds:pgTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB parameter group

rds:reqTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the set of tag keys and values that can be used to tag a resource

rds:riTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a reserved DB instance

rds:secgrpTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB security group

rds:snapshotTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB snapshot

rds:subgrpTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag attached to a DB subnet group
